name: Child Developmental Playgroups
description: Join a free playgroup, designed primarily for children aged birth to three years who have mild to moderate disabilities, learning differences, and/or complex medical needs, along with the parents and caregivers who care for them. The playgroups are small, supporting approximately 6 children per session, and are held on-site at Children’s Council once a week.

howToGetIt: For reservation use ONLINE FORM Reach out to Saeda Fuller if you have any questions: sfuller@childrenscouncil.org/ 415-276-2912
